Package com.example.controller

Klasse CompanyController

java.lang.Object
com.example.controller.CompanyController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/company") public class CompanyController extends Object
The CompanyController class handles the HTTP requests related to the Company entity.

  • Methodendetails

    • getAllCompanies

      @GetMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Company>> getAllCompanies()
      Retrieves all companies.
      Gibt zurück:
      ResponseEntity containing the list of companies

    • getCompanyById

      @GetMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Company> getCompanyById(@PathVariable("id") @NonNull UUID id)
      Retrieves a company by its ID.
      Parameter:
      id - the ID of the company
      Gibt zurück:
      ResponseEntity containing the company if found, or a not found response if not found

    • createCompany

      @PostMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Company> createCompany(@RequestBody @NonNull Company company)
      Creates a new company.
      Parameter:
      company - the company to be created
      Gibt zurück:
      ResponseEntity containing the created company if successful, or an internal server error response if not successful

    • updateCompany

      @PutMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Company> updateCompany(@PathVariable("id") @NonNull UUID id, @RequestBody @NonNull Company company)
      Updates a company.
      Parameter:
      id - the ID of the company
      company - the updated company
      Gibt zurück:
      ResponseEntity containing the updated company if successful, or a not found response if the company is not found

    • deleteCompany

      @DeleteMapping("/{id}") @ResponseStatus(OK) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Company> deleteCompany(@PathVariable("id") @NonNull UUID id)
      Deletes a company.
      Parameter:
      id - the ID of the company
      Gibt zurück:
      ResponseEntity containing the deleted company if successful, or a not found response if the company is not found
